author: arielch
msg: i121899 - Enable "hybrid" PDF export by default
Now it is enabled, even if the PDF import extension is not installed.

author: rdonkin
msg: Having problems with GPG agent on the command line. http://jira.codehaus.org/browse/MGPG-9 indicates that this setting may sort this issue out.

author: sf
msg: Make mkdir.sh save to use in parallel builds:
Don't fail if a formerly missing directory has been created by another process
